Spreading the Legacy


STARS Hospital, Vellore is the well-acclaimed health enterprise and one of the leading healthcare systems in Malabar, assures comprehensive health care services with a global standard. The 600-bedded multispecialty hospital is renowned for its excellent medical expertise, nursing care and quality diagnostic services. By focusing on the idea of caring mission with a global vision, Aster MIMS stresses on improving the health of the community by setting up the standard of excellence in medical education, research and clinical care. Aiming a patient- centric care, the hospital is utilizing enhanced lifesaving technologies for leveraging the level of cure.

A Stitch in time saves nine. Brain is Life,& Time is Brain, hence Time is Life. Every millisecond is important to us, as valuable Time lost is equivalent to Brain lost or Life lost. MIMS is one of the busiest Accident & Emergency care centers in our state, catering to approximately about 10000 acute Emergencies every year. It is well equipped with 36 beds, which includes Triage beds, observation areas, which manage all forms of Medical, Surgical, Cardiac, PolyTrauma , Paediatric, Neurological, etc. Emergencies. This is made possible by the presence of Trained & Competent Emergency Physicians, Nursing staff , & Paramedics, who work round the clock as a team ,dedicated in providing Emergency care. With an excellent back-up of other departments, like Trauma-Surgery, Orthopedics, Neurosurgery, Cardio-Thoracic Surgery, Cardiology, Neurology, Paediatric Surgery, Facio-Maxillary Surgery, Interventional Radiology, there are absolutely no short-comings in providing Emergency Medical treatment, the moment a victim is brought to the Emergency Department. All our dedicated ED staff are trained in BLS, ACLS & ATLS. All the emergency triage beds are equipped with monitors, defibrillators, ventilators, syringe pumps, intubation equipments, etc., to provide the best possible treatment in the Emergency vicinity. We have 24 hours diagnostic service departments including X-ray, USG, CT Scan, Interventional Radiology, Biochemistry, Cathlab etc., Regional Blood Bank is equipped with Ultra Modern Facilities for emergency transfusion and component therapy which is made available round the clock. We have fully functioning 13 operating rooms, and one operating room within the Emergency Department itself.
